edu.trident.hilliard.finalassignment

Class Taxi

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.trident.hilliard.finalassignment.Taxi
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RentedTaxi

    public class Taxi
extends java.lang.Object
    Taxi models a taxi with a set rate and mileage rate, gas mileage, and gas capacity as well as currentGas, currentMileage, and totalFare to track information related to the specific taxi.

    Variables:
    RIDE_RATE - constant value for initial ride charge
    RIDE_MILEAGE_RATE - constant value for per mile ride charge
    GAS_MILEAGE - constant value for gas mileage of cab
    GAS_CAPACITY - constant value for capacity of the cab's gas tank
    currentGas - amount of gas in the cab
    currentMileage - distance the cab has traveled
    totalFare - accumulated total of fares
    Author:
    Noah Hilliard

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Taxi()
      Constructor that creates a Taxi with base values of
      RIDE_RATE = 2.0;
      RIDE_MILEAGE_RATE = 0.585;
      GAS_MILEAGE = 17.8;
      currentGas = 22.9;

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFare(double fareCost)
      Called by addTrip to add current fare to total fare.
      void addGas(double addGas)
      Adds gas to the Taxi, limited to GAS_CAPACITY.
      void addMileage(double addMileage)
      Called by addTrip to add mileage to the taxi based on the value passed to it.
      void addTrip(double tripMiles)
      Calls milesAvailable to see if the Taxi has enough gas to complete the trip and calls calculateFare, addMileage, useGas, and addFare with the mileage of the trip if it can.
      double calculateFare(double tripMiles)
      Called by addTrip to calculate the fare for the current trip based on tripMiles
      double getCurrentGas()
      Returns the remaining gallons of gas in the Taxi.
      double getCurrentMileage()
      Returns the miles driven in the Taxi.
      double getTotalFare()
      Returns the fares collected in the Taxi.
      double milesAvailable()
      Calculates the distance the taxi can travel by multiplying currentGas by GAS_MILEAGE.
      void resetTaxi()
      Resets the mileage on the Taxi and the fares collected.
      void useGas(double tripMiles)
      Called by addTrip to calculate the gas a trip would use by dividing tripMiles by GAS_MILEAGE and subtracts that amount of gas from currentGas.

      • useGas

        public void useGas(double tripMiles)
        Called by addTrip to calculate the gas a trip would use by dividing tripMiles by GAS_MILEAGE and subtracts that amount of gas from currentGas.
        Parameters:
        tripMiles - - received from addTrip

      • milesAvailable

        public double milesAvailable()
        Calculates the distance the taxi can travel by multiplying currentGas by GAS_MILEAGE.
        Returns:
        mileageRemaining

      • calculateFare

        public double calculateFare(double tripMiles)
        Called by addTrip to calculate the fare for the current trip based on tripMiles
        Parameters:
        tripMiles - - based on user input received by addTrip
        Returns:
        currentFare

      • addTrip

        public void addTrip(double tripMiles)
        Calls milesAvailable to see if the Taxi has enough gas to complete the trip and calls calculateFare, addMileage, useGas, and addFare with the mileage of the trip if it can.
        Sets currentFare to 0.0 if there is not enough gas to complete the trip.
        Parameters:
        tripMiles - distance of the entered fare

      • resetTaxi

        public void resetTaxi()
        Resets the mileage on the Taxi and the fares collected.
